Google Classroom Client

Classroom is a minimal software targeted towards Students of various levels in order to access course material and announcements by Course Administrators on-the-go.
All limitations of this app is beyond the developer of the software and it has developed to make the most of the Classroom API.
The app was primarily created due to the poor state of the Google Classroom Android Application available on the Google Play Store.
This Application requires the Updated version of the Google Play Services.
Download it before filling a bug report

Why choose this Classroom client?

  • Makes Course announcements by Administrators available offline in a nice user-interface
  • Notifications for CourseWorks *
  • Availability of Google Classroom Web UI mode to cater for the limitations of the Application *

features marked above are still under development …
